name: mambo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an energetic dance from the Caribbean for two people, or the music for this dance: The evening spectacular features live music and dances from the mambo to the salsa. Cuban composers and jazz musicians have tweaked the mambo over the years. As soon as you hear it, you want to dance mambo right away.
More examplesFewer examplesThe athletic Mario can dance a mean mambo.Who could resist a show filled with tangos, mambos and acrobatic pas de deux?
